page.title: 17PUBLIC TRANSPORT - BUSES
page.content:
The area carries several different bus routes which are administered as the {Cardinal District}of London Regional Transport (formerly London Transport).
Most of the main routes have bus services but there are no local services on the M4 motorway. However there are non-stopping{Green Line}and {National Bus Company}routes between London and the west of the country, which do use the motorway.
Most of the LRT routes use double deck buses of modern design. Routes like the 207, 65 and the 237 use the older style Routemaster buses. Until recently short local routes like the E3 used single deck vehicles.
